articles.title: 10 years after UK's first hand transplant, patient and surgeon meet again - BBC
articles.description: A decade on from the UK's first hand transplant, a Leeds patient and his surgeon tell their story.
articles.content:
On 27 December 2012, the UK's first hand transplant took place at Leeds Teaching Hospitals NHS Trust (LTHT). A decade on, we spoke to the patient and his pioneering surgeon.
"Many patients say after… [+5313 chars]

articles.title: Fatty liver caused by 'two' foods linked to severe neurological problems like dementia - Express
articles.description: Mounting evidence suggests a fatty liver could hinder blood flow to the brain.
